official_title: A bill to require that all human subjects used in experiments conducted by or for the Department of Defense be informed of the nature of the experiments and that a research review board make a written certification that such subjects have freely given their informed consent to participate in the experiments, and for other purposes.
short_title: GI Medical Research Protection Act of 1981

summary.text: GI Medical Research Protection Act of 1981 - Requires all human subjects used in experiments conducted by or for the Department of Defense to be informed in understandable language of the nature of the experiments. Requires the documentation of their consent through a written form. Establishes a Research Review Board in the Department to oversee the implementation and enforcement of this Act.
